view

Class CardView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.image.ImageView
        • view.CardView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class CardView
extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
    This abstract class provides a base for classes that implements various JavaFX based views for Card objects.

        Parameters:
        faceDown - Whether the card is facing down.
        frontFace - The Image object for the front face.
        backFace - The Image object for the back face.
        shortID - The short identifier.
